content: comfy dk socks simple ribbed socks in quick to knit dk weight yarn knit top down on 2 circular needles materials handwerks classic dk 100% superwash merino 100 grams/230yds 1 2 skeins shown in taos 2 - size us 4 3 5mm circular needles 20 or 24 in length gauge 24 sts and 36 rnds = 4 /10cm in st st size one size to fit women s small to large adjust cuff and foot length for small med/large standard abbreviations used k2tog = knit 2 together p2tog = purl 2 together sl 1 = slip one stitch ssk = slip slip knit cuff cast on 48 sts using the long tail method onto one of the circular needles slide 24 sts onto the other needle being careful not to twist the round hold the two needles parallel to each other with the yarn attached to the back needle and begin ribbing start round with k1 * p2 k2 * repeat from * to * across first needle needle #1 ending with k1 work second needle needle #2 the same as needle #1 ribbing is now centered on the instep continue ribbing for 6 - 8 from cast on edge heel flap work heel stitch over 24 sts on needle #1 as follows leave instep sts for later on needle #2 row 1 rs * sl 1 as if to purl yarn in back k1 repeat from * end of row turn work row 2 ws sl 1 as if to purl p to end of row turn work repeat these 2 row 10 more times repeat row 1 again 23 row worked in total turn heel next row ws p 14sts p2tog p1 turn work ©2010 for personal use only row 2 rs sl 1 as if to purl k 5 k2tog k1 turn work row 3 ws sl 1 as if to purl p to the st before the last turn gap p2tog p1 turn work row 4 rs sl 1 as if to purl k to the st before the last turn gap k2 decrease k1 turn work repeat row 3 and 4 until there are 14 sts left on your needle ending with row 4 shape gussets with needle #1 and right side facing pickup and knit one stitch in each slipped edge stitch along the heel flap you will be picking up 12 sts pick up needle #2 and work in established ribbing pattern across instep sts place a marker continue with needle #2 and pickup and knit one stitch in each slipped edge stitch along the other side of the heel flap you will be picking up 12 sts now reposition the stitches on the needles for ease of knitting place a marker on the left end of needle #1 then slide 12 instep sts off of needle #2 from the right hand side of the instep onto needle #1 then with needle #2 knit 7 heel sts from needle #1 on needle #1
